mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ORDERS VALUES ( MEMBER_ORDERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{orders_address}, #{orders_address2}, #{orders_postcode}, SYSDATE, #{member_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT Max(MEMBER_ORDERS_NO) FROM MEMBER_ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY MEMBER_ORDERS_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ORDERS_DETAIL VALUES ( MEMBER_ORDERS_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_no}, #{orders_no}, #{orders_detail_amount}, #{orders_detail_price}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT od.ORDERS_DETAIL_NO, od.PRODUCT_NO, od.ORDERS_NO, od.ORDERS_DETAIL_AMOUNT, od.ORDERS_DETAIL_PRICE, od.ORDERS_EXCHANGED, od.TRACKING_NUM, mo.MEMBER_NO, mo.ORDERS_DATE FROM ORDERS_DETAIL od JOIN MEMBER_ORDERS mo ON od.ORDERS_NO = mo.ORDERS_NO WHERE mo.MEMBER_NO = 18 ORDER BY mo.ORDERS_DATE DESC
